General.Name: Titan Pharmaceuticals Inc
General.Description: Titan Pharmaceuticals, Inc. does not have significant operations. Previously, it was engaged in the development of therapeutics for the treatment of chronic diseases. Titan Pharmaceuticals, Inc. was founded in 1991 and is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: 10 East 53rd St., New York, NY, United States, 10022
